lender.name: The Kelly Family
lender.loan_because: we want to help give a little 'kick start' to those in need. The girls receive valuable exposure to how other people live across the globe and realize that is only luck that separates us from the ones we lend to.
lender.occupational_info: Yes... I can confirm the job does exist... chocolate tasting is fab most of the time. Coaching children in chess is truely rewarding... you can see the lights switching on.

lender.name: Sydney
lender.loan_because: In my life, many people have come and gone. Some helped, some hurt, some inspired, but all taught me something. One day, I want someone to look back on me and say I taught them something profound. For me, donating is not an option. It is my way to continue paying forward all the good done for me. It is my way of inspiring to believe in the good of their fellow man.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Executive Administrative Assistant at a company called Virtual Heroes, Inc. We make reality video games that are used to help train NASA flight crew, emergency first responders and more. It is my job to make travel arrangements for the team, answer e-mails, help co-ordinate the corporate calendar and many other tasks that help the office run smoothly. My job is wonderful!

If you make a man/woman to become self-sufficient and be able to survive without being provided for, it not only give them a sense of achievement and fulfillment but also pride in accomplishment to live the life. That is the difference we need to make in lives. Afterwards, they will pay it forward for this movement to go one and spread around the world.

lender.name: Danilo Ignacio
lender.loan_because: The World Needs knew Corporate businesses and it all starts with a TV Network that is not Affiliated and or taking money from the same old, same old if obama can do it so can we, all are welcome, all can be on ChannelLiveTV.com,Channel125.com,Network125.com, help us so we can help YOU! How do you call yourself an entertainer or entrepreneur when no body Knows Who you are? We can HelpNOW YOU CAN WATCH US ON LINE @ ChannelLiveTV.com or get The DVD and watch us on your TV @ HOME or in the CAR,Mobile Phones find out how you can be apart of this EXPERIENCE, contact us today @ the New York Office 212.202. 1988 / 646.395.1112
lender.occupational_info: ChannelLiveTV, Network 125 mission is to be a reference point and an information medium for people of color working towards a career in the arts and the entertainment industry. Connecting community oriented businesses to create a supportive foundation for the artist and to use the arts as an instrument to build a strong community. Based on a report done by Kendra Al-Kaleem, entitled Television News Images of African American & Their Effects on Self-Esteem. It included that ‚Äúthere are great benefits in broadening the scope through which African American community life is viewed. An image is a picture that triggers visual recognition and thus a relationship to (in this case, the newscast) product. The implementation of creating new images that garner positive recognition of urban Americans will create a more, well-rounded, local and national audience in the face of the new global economy and community. As technology brings the world closer a clearer understanding of urban America is critical as they continue to grow economically, politically, and socially.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: This is my way of giving a little back to helping others in housing or other social needs.
lender.occupational_info:
I manage public sector housing in a wee bit of Scotland, the capital city of Edinburgh. Elsewhere this form of housing is known as Council housing, Housing Association housing, affordable housing or public sector housing. These days, this sector largely (though not exclusively) exists to assist the more disadvantaged in society, such as the homeless and those on limited income, though this was not always the case.
All this aside, disadvantage is all relative, as the KIVA site very clearly shows.
But, if you are interested to find out more about this field of work, and housing is about creating sustainable communities, not just solely about bricks and mortar, (though that is a start if you have no shelter at all), then check out the professional body for housing, the Chartered Institute of Housing.
It covers those working in or with an interest in this area based in Scotland, England, the rest of the UK and further afield (20 countries on five continents at the latest count in total).
The Chartered Institute of Housing website can be found at www.cih.org.

I have always worked in the business world since I sold lemonade at 5 years old on the street corner with my sisters. I have worked for larger corporations and small corporations selling food and non-food products to supermarkets. I believe with hard work and a little bit of help (for example a loan) most people will succeed in business and I pray for success in your business too.
lender.occupational_info: I manage total sales for the company and try to ensure that our company makes a profit. I manage and supervise 12 people including 7 sales managers selling Mexican Food products that are in cans.

lender.name: Louise
lender.loan_because: I'm a Christian on a low wage for my country and this is an easy way for me to help by loaning money I have saved for next year etc, where I couldn't give at the same level. Also people give me money to do the job I do so this is a way for me to help others like they help me. I think wealth is badly distributed in the world too and want to help with that where I can. I heard about Kiva on a website I found called nerdfighters which is partly about trying to make the world a better place. I would also like someone to give me a loan if I needed one and am blessed to live in a country where I could get one if I needed. I think kiva is a brilliant idea!
lender.occupational_info: I work with young people in a disadvantaged part of the Scottish city I live in. We aim to get to know young people and help them to find out about God if they want to. God has made such huge changes in my life, healing me of illness and of emotional issues and just generally doing so much for me in little and big ways, that I want to let other people know that He is there for them if they want, but I'm still learning so much about Him and how to follow Him myself! Generally, we want to be available for God to use us to make a positive difference in the lives of young people, their families and the rest of the community. Mostly, I find in reality that the young people encourage me! I'm also studying for a degree in Youthwork with Applied Theology.

lender.name: Kendra
lender.loan_because: giving is important to the cycle of life.
lender.occupational_info: I work with little ones in the South Bronx, NYC.

lender.name: Carlene
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. We are the generation of change. Afterall, we learnt to share in kindergarten, why should that lesson ever be lost?
lender.occupational_info: I'm a dog trainer and a person who loves life.

lender.name: christine
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher in a public school and I also work for Calvary Fellowship in Miami Lakes.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I am doing this because I care about others and their well being. It is important for all individuals to be able to take care of themselves and provide for their family. Kiva.org gives me an opportunity to share and give hope to those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a publisher, an editorial group, a graphics group, a prepress company and printer to produce a magazine. I have many deadlines and must track all groups so that the magazine is mailed out to subscribers on time. I am also an artist and calligrapher and enjoy making greeting cards by hand.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I have long been interested in microfinance as an investor, a citizen, and a charitable giver. Kiva makes it possible.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should get a chance. Or two. Or ten.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Healer & Teacher.

lender.name: Philipp
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with a good life and feel that I need to give something back to people less fortunate than myself
lender.occupational_info: I am in the renewable energy business

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur it is my responsibility to give forward, like others gave to me when starting my business.
lender.occupational_info: We manage healthcare for people who get health benefits from their employer

lender.name: Lindsey
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Andrea & Jacob
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people all over the world make better lives for themselves and for their families.

lender.name: Muhammad Mahmood
lender.occupational_info: Improvement of social and economic condition of the poor people and their capacity bueilding to solve their socio economic prolblems together.

lender.name: Vangelis
lender.loan_because: It's the Right Thing To Do. It proves the possibilities of global grassroots activity that are opened up by the internet.
lender.occupational_info: i do internet.

lender.name: CouponAlbum.com
lender.occupation: Online Deals, Free Coupons, Coupon Codes and Barga
lender.occupational_info: Save with Online Deals, Bargains and Free Coupons. Great discounts and price comparison for maximum savings. Get best deals and stack coupon codes for bargain prices.

lender.name: keith
lender.loan_because: I would rather reach out and help others one to one this way, then through a large organization. For you never know what really happens with the money you give. They spend more time & money trying to get you to give again. I feel this way it is person to person making the world grow smaller one step at a time. Most people are trying just to make life a little better for themselves and others.

lender.name: Arno
lender.loan_because: I can and I believe it helps people improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: In a small way I help transform the way Australia produces energy.

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: I am blessed enough to be able to, and therefore I should.

lender.name: Gregg
lender.loan_because: am pleased to see people having a go at making a future for themselves
lender.occupational_info: Pig farmer 1200 sows and work as a consultant to other farmers in business planning and animal nutrition. Experienced in feed milling for pigs, chickens, dairy cattle and beef cattle. Have strong interest in goats.

lender.name: Irina
lender.occupational_info: I make acoustic covers in three languages and post them on YouTube. Many of my fans asked me to make my own CD. However, because I don't have my own income yet, I am dependent on loans or donations

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: It is important to give people an opportunity to do well.
lender.occupational_info: I teach students about the world outside their own experience.

lender.name: Sue Christian
lender.loan_because: I believe we are all in "this" together. I send love and respect with my loans to you. I have tremendous admiration for your efforts and wish you the best.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer for all the prisoners in the state of California, trying to improve living conditions for them in the prisons.

lender.name: √òyvind
lender.occupational_info: I study engineering

lender.name: Philip
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student

lender.name: Spartacus Mofo
lender.loan_because: Times are changing, so should my investments. And my investments should propel change.
